title: We Make Cookies
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 43 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 100L
description: We Make Cookies tells the story of a girl and her father making cookies. As students read the book, they learn what ingredients are used to make the cookies. The whimsical illustrations are sure to delight readers.
reviewWords: butter, eggs, flour, milk, mix, oven, salt, sugar, yum
awareness: Blend Onset and Rime                : Blend onset and rime sounds
grammar: Adjectives                : Recognize adjectives are words that tell how much or how many
